title: Chrome OS 98 adds new emoji, virtual desk keyboard shortcuts, and more
content:
While Chrome OS has a long way to go before it can match Windows and macOS, it’s in much better shape than it was a few years ago. It has kept getting better with new features and additions over time. And it’s getting even better with the latest update. Chrome OS 98 has started rolling

The post Chrome OS 98 adds new emoji, virtual desk keyboard shortcuts, and more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Chrome OS 98 has started now rolling out on the stable channel and it brings tons of improvements and features.
